title: Chicken Stir Fry
details:
Ingredients: Chicken, Bell Peppers, Broccoli, Soy Sauce.
Steps: Stir-fry chicken until cooked. Add veggies and sauce. Cook for 5â€“7 minutes.

title: Greek Salad
image: Perfect for summer Greek salad ðŸ¥—.jpeg
details:
Ingredients: Tomato, Cucumber, Feta, Olive Oil, Olives.
Steps: Chop vegetables, mix with feta and olives, drizzle olive oil.

title: Pasta Alfredo
image: Cajun Chicken Alfredo Fettuccine â€“ Spicy & Cheesy Comfort Pasta.jpeg
details:
Ingredients: Pasta, Cream, Parmesan, Garlic.
Steps: Cook pasta, prepare sauce with cream and cheese, mix together.

title: Veggie Omelette
image: Easy Masala Omelette Recipe - Spiced Eggs with Veggies.jpeg
details:
Ingredients: Eggs, Bell Peppers, Onions, Spinach.
Steps: Beat eggs, pour into pan, add veggies, cook until set.

title: Smoothie Bowl
image: Healthy Smoothie Bowl with Fresh Fruits.jpeg
details:
Ingredients: Banana, Berries, Yogurt, Granola.
Steps: Blend fruits with yogurt, pour into a bowl, top with granola.

title: Curry Rice
details:
Ingredients: Rice, Curry Powder, Vegetables, Coconut Milk.
Steps: Cook rice, prepare curry with vegetables and coconut milk, mix together.

title: Avocado Toast
details:
Ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Lemon, Salt, Pepper.
Steps: Toast bread, mash avocado with lemon and seasoning, spread on toast.

title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
details:
Ingredients: Flour, Milk, Eggs, Chocolate Chips, Sugar.
Steps: Mix ingredients, cook on a skillet, serve with syrup.

title: Mango Sushi Rolls
details:
Ingredients: Mango slices, sticky rice, coconut milk, seaweed sheets.
Steps: Spread rice on seaweed, add mango strips, roll tightly, slice and serve with a drizzle of honey or coconut sauce.
